metadata.note: Complete database of all 152 Local Authorities with Adult Social Care responsibilities in England. 22 councils have verified contact information. Remaining 130 councils have ONS codes, region, and authority type but contact details need to be added. Council of the Isles of Scilly (E06000053) excluded as it is very small and may not have full ASC responsibilities.
